values: 板；板材；隔板墙；（冰球场周围的）界墙；委员会；董事会；伙食；膳食；平台；舞台；公告牌；（比赛或游戏的）棋盘；（船只的）甲板；<美>大学入学考试
登上（交通工具）；搭乘；上（船、上火车、飞机、公共汽车等）；让乘客登机（或上船等）；寄宿；提供膳宿；（用木板）覆盖；封闭

synonym.mean: 上；用板盖上；给提供膳宿

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 用木板遮住；收费为…供膳（board的ing形式）
寄膳者；寄膳宿者；寄宿生

word_group.brief_definition: 地方教育董事会；地方教育委员会
封闭；用板围住, 用木板封闭
董事会上；董事会；板子上
踢脚板, 壁脚板, 裙板
被废弃, 被忽视；成为成员, 加入；骑马
电路板；线路板；印刷电路

bilingual.source: You must stand on the board and roll forward.
bilingual.target: 你必须站在板上向前滚动。

bilingual.source: Stick the flashcards on the board with blu-tack.
bilingual.target: 用蓝胶把单词卡片粘在板上。
在黑板上展示给他们看。

bilingual.source: The board is green and the door is purple.
bilingual.target: 板子是绿色的，门是紫色的。

bilingual.source: Draw a table on the board like the one below.
bilingual.target: 在黑板上画一个像下面这样的表格。

bilingual.source: All you need to do it is an iron and a board – an ironing board!
bilingual.target: 你只需要一个熨斗和一个熨衣板。

bilingual.source: Look! The new clubs for this term are on the board.
bilingual.target: 看！这学期的新俱乐部在公告板上。

bilingual.source: Each child had a small board and a piece of chalk.
bilingual.target: 每个孩子都有一块小黑板和一块粉笔。

bilingual.source: Show them on the board how to draw a simple computer screen.
bilingual.target: 在黑板上给他们展示如何画一个简单的电脑屏幕。

list.abstract: board，英文单词，作名词或动词，翻译为木板，公告栏，甲板，上（船火车或飞机）等等。该词来源于日耳曼语bortham和borthaz。

yingyinNormal.en: Cooper? Nobel. Kripke. Don't look at my board.
yingyinNormal.zh: 库伯。诺贝尔，克莱皮克，不许看我的板子。

yingyinNormal.en: I wrote it, I wrote it on the board. I wrote it on the board, then I went all over New York City looking for you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有写在留言板上，我写在留言板上，然后跑遍整个纽约找你。

yingyinNormal.en: What's the soup of the day? What does it say on the board? And you're trained.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今日例汤是什么？在那块板板上写的是啥？恭喜你，你学成了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well you might say congratulations. I saw the board. I went to the audition. I got the part.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那就说恭喜吧，我看到留言板，跑去试镜，我中了。

yingyinNormal.en: There was a flyer on the bulletin board at the university: "Roommate wanted. Whistlers need not apply."
yingyinNormal.zh: 大学公告板上的一张传单，"招募室友，吹口哨的勿扰"。

yingyinNormal.en: Listen, boys. You sold me on a home computer. That's a keyboard and monitor. This is a board.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，孩子们，你们卖给我的家用电脑，得有键盘和显示器，这只是电路板

yingyinNormal.en: And last night, my tent ripped, so I had to sleep under a plywood board leaning up against a van.
yingyinNormal.zh: 昨晚我的帐篷坏了，所以我不得不靠着一辆面包车睡在一块胶合板下面。

yingyinNormal.en: And even with the diagonal board, he's still not eliminating settings as quickly as we need him to in order... I'm leaving.
yingyinNormal.zh: 即使加块斜板，还是没办法很快消除设置，达不到我们预期的效果。我要走了。

yingyinNormal.en: Can we go to the Greenview pool? The one with the diving board? Please. No, that place sucks. You barely get in anyway.
yingyinNormal.zh: 能不能去绿茵泳池？带跳水板的那个，好不好？不行，那地方太烂了。反正你也基本不下水。

yingyinNormal.en: I think I need a higher board. Please be careful, Daddy pig.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我需要高一点的跳板。请小心一点，猪爸爸。

yingyinNormal.en: What's that on the board? We were Kings. Now we're Patriots.
yingyinNormal.zh: 黑板上写的是什么？我们曾经是王，但我们现在是爱国者。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I guess it's fixed. Just look at the board. That's wrong. Oh, no!
yingyinNormal.zh: 那看来修好了。快看下白板。错了。不是吧！

yingyinNormal.en: I love Wednesdays. I get to erase all the genitalia that was drawn on the cupcake board.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我好喜欢星期三，因为我可以把别人画在我们小蛋糕黑板上的鸡鸡全擦掉。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, it's flight 421. Leaves at 8:40. Yes, that what I have. It's not on the board.
yingyinNormal.zh: 421航班，8点40起飞。是啊，就是这个，看板上找不到。

yingyinNormal.en: It's Farkle who's been smart. It's Farkle who's wanted to know what Belgium 1831 was ever since it went up on the board.
yingyinNormal.zh: 法尔科才是最聪明的。法尔科才是一看到黑板上的字就想知道1831年的比利时是怎么回事的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Aren't you gonna look at the board to see how right we are? No, thanks. I'm busying tryting to fix this fuel pump. It's a manifold.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不看看白板吗，看看我们多正确？不用，多谢，我忙着修这个燃油泵。那是歧管。

yingyinNormal.en: Nothing, sir. Put him on board.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么也没有，长官。把他带到船上。

yingyinNormal.en: Do I know somebody on your board?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们董事会有我认识的人吗？

yingyinNormal.en: For this, you're gonna need the board's approval.
yingyinNormal.zh: 人体试验需要董事会的批准。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: Do you really think the board will stand for this?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你真的认为董事会会容忍你的所作所为吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 地方教育董事会；校董会
董事会上；董事会；板子上

sense_info_list.en: a group of people constituted as the decision-making body of an organization

examination_example.sentence: Haddad and Lewis are concerned that more than half the state-government <highlight>boards</highlight> are less than 40 percent female.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Haddad和Lewis担心超过一半的州政府委员会成员中女性占比不到40%。

examination_example.sentence: Female participation on corporate <highlight>boards</highlight> may not currently mirror the percentage of women in the general population.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前，女性在公司董事会中的比例可能无法反映女性在总人口中的比例。

examination_example.sentence: Indeed, women hold only 14 per cent of positions on European corporate <highlight>boards</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，欧洲公司董事会中女性仅占14%。

examination_example.sentence: Yet rather than empowering teachers to find what works best for their students, the policy imposes a flat, across-the-<highlight>board</highlight> rule.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，这项政策并没有授权教师去寻找最适合他们学生的方法，而是强加了一个统一的、全面的规则。

sense_info_list.en: enter, or get on to a vehicle
a thin, flat piece of wood or other stiff material used for various purposes
arrange for a pet animal to be temporarily taken care of at a place other than its home
live at a school during the school year
exams that you take when you apply to go to college in the US
provide with regular meals and often also lodging usually for compensation
the stage of a theater
the wooden fence surrounding the ice surface in ice hockey

word_usage.usage: board有个常考的僻义，表示“董事会”，如 corporate boards 公司董事会。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a group of people constituted as the decision-making body of an organization

examination_example.sentence: He would retire at January because of the governor's proposal to split off six universities of the <highlight>Board</highlight> of Regents system.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于州长提议拆分董事会委员会的六所大学，所以他将在1月退休。

examination_example.sentence: Spokeswoman Michelle R. Martin said officials were still working to analyze the data from the <highlight>Board</highlight> of Regents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 发言人Michelle R. Martin表示，官员们仍在努力分析董事会的数据。

sense_info_list.en: enter, or get on to a vehicle
a thin, flat piece of wood or other stiff material used for various purposes
provide with regular meals and often also lodging usually for compensation

examination_example.sentence: The Department for Education's guidance says schools can charge only for <highlight>board</highlight> and lodging if the trip is part of the syllabus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教育部给出的指导意见是，如果旅行是教学大纲的一部分，学校只能收取食宿费用。

word_usage.usage:
board基本义为名词“木板”，可引申为名词“甲板”，继而转化为动词“上（车/船/火车/飞机），如：
We'd better board the plane now. 
我们最好现在就登机。

短语on board表示“在船/火车/飞机/汽车上”，后面不能加of。如：
Please get on board at once. 
请即刻登机。

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

sense_info_list.en: a group of people constituted as the decision-making body of an organization

examination_example.sentence: After Hurricane Florence and Hurricane Michael last fall, USPS worked with state and local election <highlight>boards</highlight> to make sure that absentee ballots were available and received on time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去年秋天的佛罗伦萨飓风和迈克尔飓风过后，美国邮政总局与各州和地方选举委员会合作，以确保缺席投票能够及时收到。

examination_example.sentence: They are determined by the advising <highlight>board</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们由顾问委员会决定。

sense_info_list.en: provide with regular meals and often also lodging usually for compensation

examination_example.sentence: Nursing homes and smaller residential care homes (known in some states as <highlight>board</highlight> and care homes or adult care homes) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 养老院和较小的寄宿护理院(在一些州被称为寄宿和照护之家或成人护理院)。

sense_info_list.en: enter; or get on to a vehicle

word_usage.usage:
board基本义为名词“木板”，可引申为名词“甲板”，继而转化为动词“上（车/船/火车/飞机），如：
We'd better board the plane now. 
我们最好现在就登机。

Please get on board at once.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a thin, flat piece of wood or other stiff material used for various purposes

examination_example.sentence: A few minutes later, when I landed the trick, my friends beat their <highlight>boards</highlight> loud, shouting: "Safe! Safe! Safe!"
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几分钟后，当我完成这个动作时，我的朋友们大声拍打他们的滑板，喊道，“酷！酷！酷！”

examination_example.sentence: Weaving (穿梭) among the kids who rushed by on their <highlight>boards</highlight>, I found my way to the beam.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我在那些坐在木板上匆匆经过的孩子们中间穿梭，找到了通往横梁的路。

examination_example.sentence: Like the child on the diving <highlight>board</highlight>, you will stay undecided.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就像在跳水板上的孩子一样，你会犹豫不决。

sense_info_list.en: enter, or get on to a vehicle

examination_example.sentence: I saw there were two instructors on <highlight>board</highlight> and a man lying across the middle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我看到船上有两名教官，中间躺着一名男子。

sense_info_list.en: a group of people constituted as the decision-making body of an organization

examination_example.sentence: Ms. Jenkins means it for the <highlight>board</highlight> meeting next Monday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 詹金斯女士对下周一的董事会会议是认真的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 地方教育董事会；地方教育委员会

examination_example.sentence: Facial detection technology is also placed inside some large advertising <highlight>boards</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人脸检测技术也被放置在一些大型广告牌内。

examination_example.sentence: In big classrooms, it can be hard to see the <highlight>board</highlight> and hear what the teacher is saying.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在大教室里，很难看到黑板，也很难听到老师在说什么。

examination_example.sentence: Lin's eyes moved down the notice <highlight>board</highlight> that listed all the courses on offer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 林的目光顺着告示牌往下看，上面列出了所有提供的课程。

sense_info_list.en: a thin, flat piece of wood or other stiff material used for various purposes

examination_example.sentence: As we know, the <highlight>board</highlight> surface has 361 cross points.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们都知道，电路板表面有361个交叉点。

examination_example.sentence: The players take turns placing the stones on the game <highlight>board</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 玩家轮流将石头放在棋盘上。

examination_example.sentence: Weiqi, as an old <highlight>board</highlight> game, was invented in China more than 2,500 years ago.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 围棋，作为一种古老的棋类游戏，2500多年前诞生于中国。

sense_info_list.en: a group of people constituted as the decision-making body of an organization

examination_example.sentence: Claire asked the school <highlight>board</highlight> (董事会) to add solar panels to the project because, she explained, clean energy would be helpful to a really modern school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 克莱尔要求学校董事会 在该项目中添加太阳能电池板，她解释说，因为清洁能源对一所真正现代化的学校有好处。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>board</highlight> liked the idea but said it could offer just $ 25, 000-one-fifth of the cost.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 董事会喜欢这个主意，但表示它只能提供25,000美元，即费用的五分之一。

examination_example.sentence: Clara was sitting on an Alaska Airlines flight when she heard a worried voice over the loudspeaker: "Does anyone on <highlight>board</highlight> know American Sign Language?"
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当克拉拉乘坐阿拉斯加航空公司的航班时，她听到扩音器里传来一个担心的声音：“机上有人懂美国手语吗？”

sense_info_list.en: enter, or get on to a vehicle

examination_example.sentence: The flight to Wuhan is <highlight>boarding</highlight> now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 飞往武汉的航班现在开始登机。

word_usage.usage:
board基本义为名词“木板”，可引申为名词“甲板”，继而转化为动词“上（车/船/火车/飞机），如：
We'd better board the plane now. 
我们最好现在就登机。

短语on board表示“在船/火车/飞机/汽车上”，后面不能加of。如：
Please get on board at once. 
请即刻登机。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，指乘坐某种交通工具或走某条道路。
指及时登上飞机、火车、公共汽车等。
指上车、船、飞机等，多用于非正式文体。
